title: America's Interest In Afghanistan
description:
America's Interest In Afghanistan
                  =================================


Is the slaughter of U.S. troops justifying its presence in Afghanistan.
After watching the film Lone Survivor and witnessing the brutal slaughter of outnumbered Navy Seals, I thought it would be a good thing to research why America is continuing to have a grip on the country.

Well, first it was the Russians, then the U.S., then who else? China maybe???
Turning out be like a 2nd Vietnam war eh? Remember in Rambo 3 Colonel Samuel Trautman says to Colonel Zaysen," If you had studied your history, you would have found out that these people would rather die than give their country up. You can't defeat a people like that. We tried and we had our Vietnam. Now you're gonna have yours".


All wars on planet Earth are trade wars. Remember your Star Wars the Evil Galactic
Empire led by Darth Vader. You didn't know it but Afghanistan possesses incredible amounts of mineral resources that greedy nations of the world want(bees attracted to wildflowers). 

Its all there in the pdf file I made. Have a good read!
